caption.title:
Correlation between the reproduction number ( R
y ) and the proportion of GII or GII.4 among all the detected noroviruses.
caption.p:
The top three panels show the correlations between R
y and the proportion of GII (GII.4) among all the detected noroviruses, as based on scenarios 1, 2 and 3, respectively. Similarly, the bottom three panels examine the correlation between R
y and GII.4.
